hero_subtitle: A next-generation blockchain network for the global K-POP community
about_text: Hallyu Chain (HALL) powers the global K-POP fandom economy with transparent, secure transactions on a decentralized network where fans and artists connect directly. Join today to support your favorite stars and shape the future of fandom.
about_benefit1: Vote on exclusive content and events
about_benefit2: Connect with artists through token-based experiences
about_text2: HALL offers user-friendly wallets and cross-chain bridges, enabling fans to participate with ease.
about_text3: Through decentralized governance, fans and investors take part directly in project decisions.
about_origin: Born from the global rise of K-POP, Hallyu Chain began as a community experiment to give fans true ownership. Its long-term vision is an open cultural economy where creators and supporters share value. Newcomers can start by installing the wallet, acquiring HALL tokens, and exploring fan-driven apps on the network.
about_mission_list1: Connect fans and artists through a decentralized platform
about_mission_list2: Build a transparent and fair reward system
about_mission_list3: Encourage open-source innovation for cultural technology.
about_onboarding_list2: Acquire HALL tokens via airdrops or exchanges
about_onboarding_list3: Join the community and take part in governance
about_usecases_list1: Voting and governance within fan communities
about_benefits_list1: Rewards and special privileges for holding tokens
about_benefits_list2: Access diverse services via global partnerships
tech_list1_desc: Validators stake HALL and elect delegates to produce blocks, blending PoS security with DPoS speed.
tech_list2_desc: Smart contracts enable fan voting, rewards, and other on-chain services.
tech_list3_desc: Post-quantum signatures protect assets even against future quantum computers.
tech_list4_desc: Bridge burns a portion of fees while moving tokens across chains to reduce supply.
feat1_text: Platform where fans can join projects and share ideas
feat2_text: Transparent system for supporting favorite artists
feat3_text: A worldwide fan community beyond language and borders
tok_utility_text: Governance voting, staking rewards, exclusive event access
tok_vesting_text: Team 24 months, Advisors 12 months, Investors 18 months
tok_burn_text: 3% of each transfer is burned to reduce supply
road_q9_desc: Pilot fan-run streaming nodes for live events
road_q10_desc: Integrate AI to personalize content and experiences
road_q11_desc: Allow multi-proposal voting across fan communities
road_q12_desc: Collaborate with major agencies to launch artist-run DAOs
road_q13_desc: Launch VR concert platform powered by Hallyu Chain
road_q14_desc: Introduce Layer-2 network for low-cost microtransactions
road_q16_desc: Enable fractional ownership of K-POP goods on-chain
dao_text: Hallyu Chain is steered by HALL holders through on-chain proposals and votes.
dao_proposal: Submit proposals on-chain to guide project development.
dao_voting: Vote with your HALL tokens during each voting cycle.
dao_quorum: A 10% quorum of the total supply is required for approval.
dao_token: HALL tokens are used for governance and voting power.
footer_text: Â© 2026 Hallyu Chain. Information on this site is not investment advice.
newsletter_text: Get the latest updates and airdrop news straight to your inbox.
faq_a1: Hallyu Chain is a blockchain-based digital asset for the K-POP community.
faq_a2: Tokens can be acquired through official airdrops or partner exchanges.
faq_q3: How do I stake my tokens?
faq_a3: Use our staking guide to lock HALL and earn rewards.
faq_q4: What security measures does Hallyu Chain use?
faq_a4: Audited smart contracts and a hybrid PoS/DPoS consensus secure the network.
faq_a5: HALL tokens are split among community rewards, the team, investors, advisors, and the DAO treasury with vesting.
faq_q6: How can I bridge assets to Hallyu Chain?
faq_a6: Use the official cross-chain bridge to move tokens from other networks.
faq_a7: Stakers receive a share of network fees and newly issued tokens.
faq_q8: What is the token burn rate?
faq_a8: 3% of every transfer fee is permanently burned to reduce total supply.
faq_q9: What steps are involved in using the bridge?
faq_a9: Connect your wallet, select the source and target networks and token, review the fees, and approve the transaction.
faq_q10: How does Hallyu Chain ensure regulatory compliance?
faq_a10: The project follows KYC/AML guidelines and complies with digital asset regulations in applicable jurisdictions.
corporate_hero_subtitle: Our brand values and visual identity
corporate_brand_text: Hallyu Chain's identity blends vibrant pop culture with cutting-edge blockchain innovation.
corporate_mission_text: Our mission is to connect K-POP fans worldwide through innovative blockchain solutions.
corporate_vision_text: Our vision is a borderless cultural ecosystem powered by Hallyu Chain.
corporate_voice_text: Our voice is passionate, inclusive, and community-driven.
corporate_logo_usage: Follow these rules when using the logo:
corporate_logo_clearspace: Maintain clear space equal to the symbol's height around the logo.
corporate_logo_minimum: Minimum display size is 24px in width for legibility.
corporate_logo_background: Use on solid light or dark backgrounds; use hall-symbol-dark.svg on light backgrounds and hall-symbol-light.svg on dark backgrounds.
corporate_font_combination_text: Pair Montserrat headings with Roboto body text to maintain typographic consistency.
corporate_spacing_text: Use an 8px spacing system between elements.
corporate_icon_text: Use Material Symbols Outlined icons and keep a minimum size of 24px for legibility.
